author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR modernizes `AlcaPCCProducer` and makes it use `edm::LuminosityBlockCache` in order to support concurrent lumis (see #25090).

Resolves https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/108

#### PR validation:

Limited matrix runs.
title: Use LuminosityBlockCache in AlcaPCCProducer
